summary: This bill, HR 3385, directs the Secretary of Transportation to update the definition of 'motorcycle' in federal regulations. The bill mandates the Secretary to issue new regulations within 120 days of the bill's enactment, amending the existing definition to match the specific definition provided in the bill. The new definition emphasizes characteristics of motorcycle design and function, including seating, wheel configuration, steering, acceleration/braking controls, and speed capabilities.
